author.name: Æthelred the Skald
author.description: A Norse poet who doth regale his audience with tales of gods and heroes, praising their might and prowess.

newsMedieval:
Lo! Hear the troubling tale I tell,
Of Southwest Airlines and their fell:
Their flights did cease o’er land and wave,
For issues intermittent, grave.

To Anatolia's realm, we sail,
Where negligence brought doom and wail,
In Earthquake's wake, with harm profound,
Erdogan's rule did aid the ground.

Now heed, O chiefs, whose coffers keep,
For AI comes, to stir thy sleep,
The Finance Function, soon to change,
Thy risk-averse hearts must rearrange.

feedItems.title: Southwest Airlines Halts Flights, FAA Says
feedItems.description: Airline implements ground stop, citing ‘intermittent issues.’

feedItems.title: Decades of Negligence and Mismanagement Made Turkey's Earthquake Deadlier
feedItems.description: A comprehensive review shows that widespread problems in the country’s construction boom under the Erdogan government added to the devastating toll.

feedItems.title: AI Is Heading to the Finance Function. Here's How Risk-Averse CFOs Can Adapt.
feedItems.description: Nascent technologies promise to disrupt budgeting and forecasting and automate mundane accounting duties, but inertia among finance chiefs may slow adoption.

author.name: Conchobar mac Nessa
author.description: An Irish bard who doth sing of the battles and triumphs of his people, preserving their traditions and history.

newsMedieval:
In lands afar of sun and sea,
A tale I weave of St. Barts' spree,
A sum so vast, a price untold,
For acres fair and waters bold.

Once graced by Rockefeller's hand,
Now claiméd by another's brand,
A fortune paid beyond compare,
A record sum for island fair.

In Amazon, a beast doth slow,
Yet landlord's gold doth never woe,
For Prologis sees rents increase,
As online wealth doth ne'er cease.

Now turn our eyes to banks afar,
Their struggles marked, like many a scar,
The vault doth creak in weary state,
As first-quarter earnings bear the weight.

feedItems.title: St. Barts Estate Sells for About $136 Million, a Record for the Caribbean Island
feedItems.description: The roughly 130-acre waterfront property was once owned by David Rockefeller, who used it as a vacation home

feedItems.title: Amazon's Slowdown Has Yet to Pinch Its Landlord
feedItems.description: Warehouse giant Prologis said rents continued to rise in the first quarter, as U.S. consumers keep spending money online.

feedItems.title: Track How U.S. Banks Are Faring in First-Quarter Earnings
feedItems.description: The industry is under stress it hasn’t seen in years. The Wall Street Journal breaks down the reports to give you a glimpse into the vault.

author.name: Guillemette de Ventadour
author.description: A troubadour from Occitania who doth compose songs of love and chivalry, enchanting all who hear her voice.

newsMedieval:
In this season of tax, a marvel dost appear,
The hold profound, away with haste doth steer.
By four-score less and five, the wait doth ease,
And IRS doth weary minds appease.

O lo! The tide of pestilence doth turn,
To single dose, our gaze for hope discern.
Omicron-targeting, the shot we trust,
In high-risk plight, a booster aid robust.

From distant North, Canada doth pluck,
A leviathan of steel, in plight so stuck,
In harbored refuge, midst Toronto's thrall,
A gift of aide, to valiant Ukraine calls.

feedItems.title: Tax Day: IRS Left Fewer Taxpayers on Hold This Year
feedItems.description: The average wait time to speak to a representative dropped 85% this tax season, officials said.

feedItems.title: Single Dose of Omicron-Targeting Vaccines to Become Main Covid-19 Shot in U.S.
feedItems.description: The FDA also authorized a second Omicron-targeting booster shot for high-risk groups.

feedItems.title: Canada Plans to Seize Russian Cargo Plane and Give It to Ukraine
feedItems.description: The Canadian government plans to seize a giant Russian cargo plane that has been stuck in Toronto for more than a year and give it to Ukraine to aid that country’s war efforts, according to Ukraine’s prime minister.
